title: Introducing: Greg Hvnsen
body:
There’s simply no beating a good pop hook, and there’s no doubting that Florida’s **Greg Hvnsen** has them in abundance.

The four tracks on his Soundcloud are some of the most ambitious I’ve heard in quite a while, from the chorus led Run, to recent track Sugar, showcasing his finest songwriting to date, there’s a suggestion here that he’s hit on something rather special. Check out a couple of favourites below.
